name: üö® Critical GPU/CPU Failures
description: Tests that failed due to hardware or driver-level issues during GPU benchmarking.
messageRegex:
.*(device not found
CUDA error
illegal memory access
GPU failure).*

name: ‚öôÔ∏è Environment / Configuration Errors
description: Failures caused by missing libraries, misconfigured environments, or dependency issues.
messageRegex:
.*(ModuleNotFoundError
ImportError
No module named
missing DLL
torch not installed).*

name: üêç Python Runtime Exceptions
description: Uncaught Python exceptions during test execution.

name: üìâ Performance Regression
description: Performance dropped significantly compared to previous benchmark baselines.
messageRegex:
.*(below expected FPS
throughput regression
performance degradation).*

name: üß† Memory / Resource Issues
description: Tests that failed due to out-of-memory errors or excessive resource consumption.
messageRegex:
.*(out of memory
MemoryError
resource exhausted
allocation failed).*

name: ‚è±Ô∏è Timeout / Deadlock
description: Tests that exceeded the allowed runtime or deadlocked under load.
messageRegex:
.*(timeout
timed out
hung
deadlock
not responding).*

name: üîß Infrastructure / Reporting Errors
description: Allure, benchmark, or plotting tool issues encountered during reporting.

name: üìä Benchmark Validation Errors
description: Test benchmark results did not meet the defined thresholds.

name: ‚ö° Stress / Stability Issues
description: Stress tests where system became unstable under high computational load.

name: ‚úÖ Passed Benchmarks
description: All performance tests executed successfully and met expectations.

name: üì¶ Missing Dependency Errors
description: Failures caused by missing pytest dependencies such as colorama, exceptiongroup, iniconfig, packaging, pygments, tomli, and py-cpuinfo.
messageRegex: .*(No module named 'colorama'|No module named 'exceptiongroup'|No module named 'iniconfig'|No module named 'packaging'|No module named 'pygments'|No module named 'tomli'|No module named 'py_cpuinfo').*
